I am willing to compromise the storyline for the sake of having the 50 
Project completed.

Most of own scenarios would work so much easier if I could send a team 
of 10+ through them, but how would I do that if I don't have scenarios 
that I can send 10+ characters through?  That's my argument for the 50 
Project and the fact it takes over 1 year to complete a set of 50 
scenarios by yourself.

My goal was 50 scenarios for the 50 Project, but I am not going to 
limit to 50 scenarios as long as it doesn't stretch out to 100 
scenarios.
